CustomField.description: The dollar amount of the maximum reimbursement rate for WFD New Hire / Internship at that point in time.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For WFD New Hire, the comparison takes place after the reimbursement percentage is applied to the total rate [final_rate_reimbursed = (total_rate X reimbursement_%) OR max_rate_reimbursed, whichever is less]. For WFD Internship, this rate is compared to the employee's hourly rate before applying the reimbursement percentage [final_rate_reimbursed = reimbursement_% X (total_rate OR max_rate_reimbursed, whichever is less)]. The max rate reimbursed is subject to periodic change.
CustomField.label: Max Rate Reimbursed
